sentences.en: Do you realize, woman, the scandal and publicity that will be involved?
sentences.cn: 臭婆娘，你知不知道这会恶名远扬？

sentences.en: Having spent a lifetime avidly courting publicity, Paul has suddenly become secretive.
sentences.cn: 保罗一生都在想方设法出风头，现在却突然行事低调了。
他一直有意避开媒体的关注。

sentences.en: He was arrested in a blaze of publicity.
sentences.cn: 他在铺天盖地的报道中被捕了。

sentences.en: Is it love of publicity or plain stupidity on her part?
sentences.cn: 她是喜欢抛头露面，还是太过愚蠢了呢？

sentences.en: It was all a publicity stunt.
Mr Branson's victory, and all the attendant publicity, were well deserved.
sentences.cn: 布兰森先生的胜利，以及随之而来的关注度，都是理所应当的。

sentences.en: Mr Stocks can expect a gruelling week on the publicity treadmill.
sentences.cn: 斯托克斯先生可以预见下一周会被枯燥繁重的宣传工作搞得焦头烂额。

sentences.en: Much advance publicity was given to the talks.
sentences.cn: 对于这次会谈有很多前期报道。

sentences.en: Norma is said to dislike the glare of publicity.
sentences.cn: 据说诺尔玛不喜欢被人过多关注。

sentences.en: The case has generated enormous publicity in Brazil.
sentences.cn: 这个案件已经在巴西引起了极大的关注。

sentences.en: The next item on the agenda is the publicity budget.
sentences.cn: 议程表上的下一项是宣传预算。

sentences.en: The publicity-shy singer spoke frankly in his first interview in three years.
sentences.cn: 这位不喜欢抛头露面的歌手在3年来的首次访谈中畅所欲言。

sentences.en: The trouble with her is she needs her daily fix of publicity.
sentences.cn: 她的问题在于她每天都想要在媒体上曝一曝光。

sentences.en: Why give publicity to this self-indulgent, adolescent oaf?
sentences.cn: 为什么要宣传报道这个行为任性、青春期未满的白痴呢？
